name: Pushcat
description: Pushing boulders, matching gems and mining silver... that's what life's all about.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or later Processor: 1.5 GHz, single core Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Any Storage: 100 MB available space Sound Card: Any

reviews.review_text: Pushcat is a match 3 game, with digdug elements.  You match gems to produce enough coins for you to progress, but its often not that simple due to the terrain and level design.   Well worth your time if you like match three games.
Really good game. I was playing this game before Steam and I'm happy it got accepted on steam.
Good game, makes you think only a little, quite easy but still enjoyable. Graphics are ok, kind of cool a bit old school :)

Even when the graphics are not that appealing, the game is good enough to keep me entertained. When I first see a new puzzle it seems quite simple, but it requires in fact some time to solve it. In order to advance/unlock a level you require to get a fixated amount of coins, once you do, the door opens and you can move forward. I enjoy three-match games and this one, while not too challenging nor too easy, gives me a good time whenever I play it.
